HDG.LOG.content: a protection in which what lies before remains (bleibt) laid down: stored, laid away, secured & deposited in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), sheltered in unconcealment > the keisthai of upokeimenon: presencing (Anwesen) of that which lies before us into unconcealment: legein concerns safety (Geborgenheit), safekeeping, gathering appropriate to such a laying [what about annihilation?], safety of that which comes together into presence (des beisammen-Anwesenden)

motif.name: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP
motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

HDG.ID.content: Being & beings are always found to be already there by virtue of & w/in the difference [so close to Derrida, differance, save the “the”] > where does “btwn” come from into which difference is to be inserted? [too representative?]

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.BC.content: resolve to attain essential knowing [to-come] need not, at first, concern itself w/ inception of our history [how so?] > applying to ourselves the test of whether we are setting out on path of reflection: inner freedom
HDG.BC.linkedContent: resolve to attain essential knowing [to-come] need not, at first, concern itself w/ inception of our history [how so?] > applying to ourselves the test of whether we are setting out on path of reflection: inner freedom

HDG.BC.content: reflection saves us, inner choice (innere Wahl): what alone remains essence comes into view almost (fast) of itself [causa sui?], attend to what we can do w/out, choose whether or not to expose (ausgesetzt) ourselves to claim essential (Anspruch des Wesenhaften) makes on us > each person responsible for himself, for his delusions, for that which he holds himself ready
HDG.BC.linkedContent: reflection saves us, inner choice (innere Wahl): what alone remains essence comes into view almost (fast) of itself [causa sui?], attend to what we can do w/out, choose whether or not to expose (ausgesetzt) ourselves to claim essential (Anspruch des Wesenhaften) makes on us > each person responsible for himself, for his delusions, for that which he holds himself ready

HDG.BC.content: “poetic propositions” : “poetic” is the exception, things don’t lie as much on surface as they do in familiar [would Derrida agree?] > “is” derives [schöpft?] its meaning from being represented/addressed/articulated in proposition [Being needs beings]

HDG.BC.content: participation (Anteilnahme) in inner law of age is needed, awakens a heightened knowledge delivered over to something necessary
HDG.BC.linkedContent: participation (Anteilnahme) in inner law of age is needed, awakens a heightened knowledge delivered over to something necessary

HDG.QB.content: nihilism consummated when seizes all subsisting resources, when nothing can assert itself as an exception anymore [oblivion of Being]: condition of normality a consequence of consummation (Vollendung) > essence of nihilism prevails in advance [destiny] of nihilistic phenomena, consummation not nihilism’s end: w/ consummation first begins final phase of nihilism
HDG.QB.linkedContent: nihilism consummated when seizes all subsisting resources, when nothing can assert itself as an exception anymore [oblivion of Being]: condition of normality a consequence of consummation (Vollendung) > essence of nihilism prevails in advance [destiny] of nihilistic phenomena, consummation not nihilism’s end: w/ consummation first begins final phase of nihilism

HDG.FS.content: [Heidegger on Aufheben] sublation as 1) “to place something on,” let opposites come forth, sublation = to Latin “tollere,” taking (tolle, lege) [Aufhebung as take up & read?] 2) Latin “elevare” 3) preserving, conserving, brining to a safe place

HDG.FS.content: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.FS.linkedContent: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth

HDG.FS.content: subjectivity itself not questioned re: its being > since Descartes, subjectivity is fundamentum inconcussum, the barrier to unfolding Seinsfrage ——the “making-present-to-oneself (Selbstvergegenwärtigung)” of consciousness takes place in immanence, what I am conscious of is present to me, in my consciousness > in Being and Time, “thing” no longer in consciousness, but in the world > despite intentionality, Husserl remains trapped in immanence: Husserl retrieves proper consistency of object, saves object, but by situating it in immanence of consciousness
HDG.FS.linkedContent: subjectivity itself not questioned re: its being > since Descartes, subjectivity is fundamentum inconcussum, the barrier to unfolding Seinsfrage ——the “making-present-to-oneself (Selbstvergegenwärtigung)” of consciousness takes place in immanence, what I am conscious of is present to me, in my consciousness > in Being and Time, “thing” no longer in consciousness, but in the world > despite intentionality, Husserl remains trapped in immanence: Husserl retrieves proper consistency of object, saves object, but by situating it in immanence of consciousness

HDG.CCP.content: as release from transcendental re-presentation, Gelassenheit is a relinquishing of the willing of a horizon > this relinquishing doesn’t stem from a willing, except the occasion for releasing oneself to Gegnet “requires a trace of willing” > this trace vanishes while releasing oneself & is completely extinguished in Gelassenheit [annihilation of trace or absolute ash?]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: as release from transcendental re-presentation, Gelassenheit is a relinquishing of the willing of a horizon > this relinquishing doesn’t stem from a willing, except the occasion for releasing oneself to Gegnet “requires a trace of willing” > this trace vanishes while releasing oneself & is completely extinguished in Gelassenheit [annihilation of trace or absolute ash?]

HDG.CCP.content: steadfastness (Ausdauer) hidden in Gelassenheit: Gelassenheit becomes increasingly clearer about its inner nature, being steadfast, stands w/in this > the composure (Verhaltenheit) of Gelassenheit > could correspond to highest willing, but could not > “in-dwelling (Inständigkeit)”
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: steadfastness (Ausdauer) hidden in Gelassenheit: Gelassenheit becomes increasingly clearer about its inner nature, being steadfast, stands w/in this > the composure (Verhaltenheit) of Gelassenheit > could correspond to highest willing, but could not > “in-dwelling (Inständigkeit)”

HDG.LP.content: soul is strange on earth (Wesen of soul), always underway, follows the draw (Zug) of its nature > earth where the soul’s wandering can’t reach, soul seeks (sucht) the earth [Schelling], such poetic wandering builds/dwells on earth, can save (retten) the earth as earth
HDG.LP.linkedContent: soul is strange on earth (Wesen of soul), always underway, follows the draw (Zug) of its nature > earth where the soul’s wandering can’t reach, soul seeks (sucht) the earth [Schelling], such poetic wandering builds/dwells on earth, can save (retten) the earth as earth

HDG.LP.content: the way apartness flames, it is spirit & thus gathering power, Das Versammelnde der Abgeschiedenheit, saves the unborn beyond the used-up for a coming rebirth of mankind, gathering power, spirit of gentleness, stills spirit of evil

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.LP.content: Trakl’s poetry doesn’t need historical objects because historical in highest sense: sings of the destiny of casts/blows (Geschick des Schlages), that which casts Menschengeschlecht away (verschlägt) in its still withheld nature [?]—i.e. saves mankind
HDG.LP.linkedContent: Trakl’s poetry doesn’t need historical objects because historical in highest sense: sings of the destiny of casts/blows (Geschick des Schlages), that which casts Menschengeschlecht away (verschlägt) in its still withheld nature [?]—i.e. saves mankind

HDG.WL.content: what is speaking (Sprechen), the expression of thought, if we think of its origin as the inner activity of spirit (inneren Geistestätigkeit)? > acc. modern thought, labor of spirit (Arbeit des Geistes) is a setting/positing (Setzen) (thesis), spirit conceived as subject, represented w/in subject-object model (Schema), so positing must be synthesis btwn subject/object

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.WL.content: Humboldt: inner illumination could impart such a different form to language, it would become totally other (ganz anderen) and new [presence worthy of the name?], an old shell (Gehäuse) w/ a new meaning
